org.itsnat.core.http
Interface ItsNatHttpSession

All Superinterfaces:
ItsNatSession, ItsNatUserData
public interface ItsNatHttpSession
extends ItsNatSession

Is the ItsNat wrapper of a javax.servlet.http.HttpSession object.

The ItsNat the session concept is borrowed from the HTTP Java Servlet session concept.

The live of an ItsNat session is the same as the wrapped HttpSession.

Author:
Jose Maria Arranz Santamaria
See Also:
ItsNatHttpServletRequest.getItsNatHttpSession()

Method Detail

getHttpSession

javax.servlet.http.HttpSession getHttpSession()
Returns the wrapped javax.servlet.http.HttpSession object.

Returns:
the wrapped servlet session object.

getUserAgent

java.lang.String getUserAgent()
Returns the user agent that started this session.

This value is obtained from the first request that started this session calling HttpServletRequest.getHeader(String) with "User-Agent" as parameter.

In a typical HTTP environment the user agent (a browser) does not change alongside the session.

Returns:
the user agent of this session.
